alert.note: Alert for Hudspeth (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 5:51PM CDT until August 04 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Hudspeth County in western Texas... * Until 530 PM MDT. * At 450 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Sierra Blanca, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Sierra Blanca and Quitman Canyon. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas near mile marker 107. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
